# Echarts 4 For R {#chap:echarts4r}

相比于 **plotly**，**echarts4r** 更加轻量，这得益于 JavaScript 库 Echarts。地图

```{r}
library(echarts4r)
quakes %>% 
  e_charts(long) %>% 
  e_geo(
    roam = TRUE,
    boundingCoords = list(
      c(185, - 10),
      c(165, -40)
    )
  ) %>% 
  e_scatter(
    lat, mag, 
    coord_system = "geo"
  ) %>% 
  e_visual_map(mag, scale = e_scale)
```

日历图

```{r}
airquality %>%
  transform(date = seq.Date(
    from = as.Date("1973-05-01"),
    to = as.Date("1973-09-30"), by = "day"
  )) %>%
  e_charts(date) %>% 
  e_calendar(range = "1973") %>% 
  e_heatmap(Temp, coord_system = "calendar") %>% 
  e_visual_map(max = max(airquality$Temp)) %>% 
  e_title("Calendar", "Heatmap")
```
